body.head: NAF000390
body.p: [When] the sun rose, ǀχụé was ǃnáχane; the birds ate ǀχụé; ǀχụé was ǃnáχane. The sun set, [and] ǀχụé, was ǀχụé; and lay down and slept. The night fell, and ǀχụé lay down, [he] slept; the place was dark; and the sun rose, and ǀχụé was another [kind of] ǃnáχane, a large [kind of] ǃnáχane, which is a tree. And the night fell, [and] ǀχụé was not a tree, and was ǀχụé, and lay down.
